participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and creative, loves engaging in artistic activities.
participant_1.background: I am in high school. I am on a competitive dance team. Ariel is my favorite princess. I love disney movies.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and passionate about literature, enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: On weekends I like to go hiking. I want to teach kids in elementary school. I live in a big city. My major was american literature and education.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking on weekends.
That's cool. I like to go hiking too. I've been to Yosemite National Park a few times.
Oh, that's awesome! I've never been to Yosemite National Park, but I've always wanted to go.
It's beautiful. You should definitely go sometime.
I will!
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to read. I'm a big fan of American literature.
That's cool. I like to read too. I'm a big fan of fantasy and science fiction.
Oh, that's cool. I've never really been into fantasy or science fiction.
You should check it out sometime. There are some really great books out there.
I will!
So, what do you want to do when you grow up?
I want to be a teacher. I want to teach kids in elementary school.
That's a great goal. I'm sure you'd be a great teacher.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what are you doing right now?
I'm a student. I'm majoring in American literature and education.
That's awesome. I'm sure you're going to do great things.
Thanks! I hope so.
